But let not the young men and young women in our churches be advised to go to Battle Creek in order to obtain a preparatory 


             -243- 

education. There is a congested state of things at Battle Creek that makes it an unfavorable place for the proper education of Christian workers. Because the warnings in regard to the work in that congested center have not been heeded, the Lord permitted two of our institutions to be consumed by fire.
